math directive
.
```{math}
w_{t+1} = (1 + r_{t+1}) s(w_t) + y_{t+1}
```
.
<div class="math block">
w_{t+1} = (1 + r_{t+1}) s(w_t) + y_{t+1}
</div>
.

math directive with label
.
```{math}
:label: my_label
w_{t+1} = (1 + r_{t+1}) s(w_t) + y_{t+1}
```
.
<div class="math block">
w_{t+1} = (1 + r_{t+1}) s(w_t) + y_{t+1}
</div>
.
